attributes.additional_details:
Free porn on the internet should be removed because we are unable to restrict who has access to it.

If you had to pay for porn online then you are automatically placing obstacles in the path of individuals trying to access graphic content, whom are not legally allowed to do so.

This would also make it more difficult for individuals to upload indecent content on to the web for members of the public to view.

Free porn damages the careers of many aspiring adult content professionals and leaves members of the public susceptible to coming across indecent imagery online due to the many spam sites which exist due to the free porn phenomenon.

Removing free porn content would help strengthen a taxable industry and make the web a safer place to surf.

Remove free porn from our web.
